=Table user_unit_profiles=
==Remarks==
This table associates an user_unit to a profile.
The primary key of the table is formed by id_user_unit and id_profile.

==Schema==
|| *Name* || *Type* || *Not Null* || *Primary Key* || *Foreign Key* || *Remarks * ||
|| id_user_unit || integer || X ||  || [user_unit](id_user_unit) || This is a foreign key to the table user_unit. ||
|| id_profile || integer || X ||  ||  || This is a foreign key to the table profile. ||
